text: Today I visited the @HopewellOhioNPS & was able to see firsthand the unmet maintenance needs, including the exterior of the visitor center & trail repair. My Restore Our Parks Act will benefit this park as well as the 7 other national park sites in #Ohio https://t.co/Aggq9bofP6

Protecting and preserving our #NationalParks is one of my top priorities & that’s why I introduced the bipartisan Restore Our Parks Act to address the nearly $12B in long-delayed maintenance at our parks, including the more than $100M at the 8 #Ohio sites. https://t.co/o1trrKSAeb

In the wake of the anti-Semitic murders last weekend, Jane & I extend our wishes for a peaceful Shabbat to all of our friends in the Jewish community. I visited the #Youngstown JCC earlier this week to hear their ideas on how to stop anti-Semitism & keep the Jewish community safe

Last week, @POTUS signed into law a series of landmark #opioidreforms, including my bipartisan #STOPAct that I fought for during the past two years. It  will help stop fentanyl from being shipped into our country and make a difference for #Ohio.

One of my top priorities in the Senate is protecting the #GreatLakes. The America’s Water Infrastructure Act that was signed into law last month will help to do just that by upgrading the water infrastructure, and creating more #jobs. https://t.co/6F4Qf7MjVD #Ohio
The @OhioStateFB #Buckeyes are looking good with their black out uniforms and cleats courtesy of @KingJames. Now it's time to win this game and #WinTheMoment

It’s awesome to see firsthand how #taxreform is helping businesses & local region’s economy, as I did yesterday during my visit to Petta Enterprises. Thanks to #taxreform, they were able to purchase a new truck & trailer & hire more workers! #jobs https://t.co/lH1mjyL1Dv

Two recent opioid laws I’ve authored & worked on, #CARA & #CURES, are benefiting #Ohio. I visited Sidney & Celina this week, where those on the frontlines are using grant funding from these laws to make a difference in their communities. https://t.co/1g1z4NUuJk

On trade, we must simultaneously fight to open new markets for our products & services while vigorously enforcing the laws to protect American workers & industries from unfair trade from other countries like #China. More in my @clevelanddotcom op-ed: https://t.co/kRKk7SPA09 #Jobs

I toured the Medina County Career Center earlier this week & I was proud of the important work they’re doing. #Ohio’s manufacturing sector has many in-demand #jobs & this career center is dedicated to helping #Ohioans get the skills & training needed to fill these positions. https://t.co/hHg4BjUpTN

I’m excited that #Cleveland will host the 2022 #NBAAllStar Game. Last year I urged the @NBA to select #Cleveland & I’m glad they agreed to bring this star-studded event to #Ohio & us to show off this great city! https://t.co/6vO1qLzinq

The @USDOL released the October #jobs report & it is great news! Exceeding expectations,  250,000 jobs were created in October, wages are up & more than 700,000 Americans have returned to the workforce.#Ohio  https://t.co/8NMbR0LnC2 #taxreform

Good news for #Ohio in the jobs report. Wages for all private-sector workers are rising at a 3.1 percent rate over the year, the fastest since April 2009. And wages for production and nonsupervisory workers are rising even faster at 3.2 percent. More here: https://t.co/XC2CyMreeq

My #STOPAct & #SESTA are great examples of strong bipartisan legislation that is working. In my op-ed for @thehill, I note that serious bipartisan bills may not receive as much attention as partisan fights but they’re worth holding up as models of the way Congress should act.

Earlier this week I toured Shelby County’s Sheriff Treatment & Recovery (STAR) House, a new safe & sober living environment to help former prisoners overcome their addiction. This is a great example of a community coming together to help others achieve their God-given potential https://t.co/g7oEeFj4fE

This week I sent a second letter to the @usedgov urging them to discharge all Parent PLUS loans borrowed on behalf of students who become totally & permanently disabled. This is a common-sense change that is critical to many families. https://t.co/g3GuWzuxMn

Our #NationalParks see millions of visitors every year & subsequently need maintenance that often is delayed, like at @HopewellOhioNPS, which I visited earlier this week. My bipartisan Restore Our Parks Act will address this problem and benefit #Ohio’s 8 park sites.

Productive discussion this morning with community leaders at Scott Park Training Center in #Toledo. I will continue to lead efforts to strengthen CTE programs so that all Ohioans can find meaningful employment. https://t.co/paSJ0r1iAG #jobs https://t.co/cdalKGEHCR

Every Ohioan should have the opportunity to get the training they need for today’s in-demand #jobs, regardless of economic standing, and I’m encouraged by what I saw today at Scott Park Training Center in #Toledo #Ohio https://t.co/k2a0ccRxjz

Last week I visited @HopewellOhioNPS and saw firsthand the $2.1 million in unmet maintenance needs. My Restore Our Parks Act will benefit this park as well as the 7 other #NationalParks sites in #Ohio. More from @ChilliGaz here: https://t.co/OjUVTtdWs3

All across #Ohio, I hear about the benefits of #taxreform from workers & employers. More good news today via @CNBC: “October service sector growth strong as economy remains hot” https://t.co/LV6iuBV9kw #jobs

Proud of the progress we’ve made over the last 2 yrs on #taxreform, #jobs & our strong economy, on combating the opioid epidemic (#STOPAct), curbing online trafficking (#SESTA) & protecting the #GreatLakes. #Ohio

I’m encouraged by @miamiuniversity & its partnership w/ the Butler County Mental Health & Addiction Recovery Services Board to research the #opioidcrisis. It’s another way my bipartisan #CARA law is benefiting #Ohio. https://t.co/NltKk1a6bZ

The US Senate Page Program is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for students to see Congress from the front row! The deadline to apply is Nov 26 so if you or someone you know is interested, here is the info: https://t.co/kiIyg00oEg

Jeff Sessions is a friend, a former colleague, & an honorable public servant. As a senator & as attorney general, he has always had the best interests of our country at heart. Here’s my full statement: https://t.co/pMptkDRIEe

In a recent op-ed for @TheHill, I discuss my efforts to work across the aisle to deliver results for #Ohio, including getting #SESTA & #STOPAct signed into law this year. This is how Congress is supposed to work. https://t.co/OW943A0K5A

Jane and I mourn with all of California after the horrific attack overnight. As we lift the victims and their families up in prayer, we are eternally grateful for the swift actions of brave first responders at the scene and medical professionals treating the survivors.

8 Cuyahoga Co deputies & 2 DEA agents were hospitalized in #Ohio yesterday after being exposed to fentanyl. Thankfully, they all checked out okay! Thank you for your brave service & for being on the frontlines of the #opioidcrisis. https://t.co/56oDcoaJf5

I applaud these #Ohio employers for receiving the HIRE Vets Medallion Awards for their commitment to hiring & retaining veterans. I hope they will set an example for other employers of the importance of prioritizing efforts to hire our veterans. https://t.co/dHxFnBkcxM

The new Sofidel Plant will create nearly 700 #jobs for the local community in Circleville. I enjoyed touring the new facility, speaking with employees & learning about how this plant will benefit the local economy. https://t.co/JK9sMd8hTD

Great to visit @BrewDogDogTap yesterday to discuss how #taxreform is providing significant relief to the growing craft beer industry helping these #Ohio entrepreneurs reinvest more in their businesses and our communities. https://t.co/G0VFs8RwAd

#Taxreform is helping entrepreneurial small businesses like @BrewDogDogTap expand, which means the growing craft brewing industry in #Ohio will hire more workers, offer better benefits, and purchase new equipment. https://t.co/iwkRiAoQaw
Saw the impressive capabilities of the @121ARW this morning at Rickenbacker. I’ll continue to fight for the base in the years ahead. https://t.co/gZSSRPBgBh

I've been working to ensure Jewish facilities across #Ohio have access to federal security grants. I’Ve urged Senate leadership to pass the DHS Authorization Act, which includes my amendments to improve safety at these facilities. More from @CleveJN: https://t.co/o2K6KB7HMZ

Happy 243rd birthday to the few and the proud. I am fortunate to have a Marine - Col. Wayne Jones (ret.)  - handling our national security and foreign affairs issues. Thanks, @USMC, for all you do to keep us safe.

Across #Ohio, employers tell me they need more skilled workers. I was encouraged by the discussion we had at Toledo’s innovative Scott Park Training Center this week on how to provide #Ohioans the skills they need to fill in-demand jobs https://t.co/ITtcIZkBQJ
.@OhioStateFB has tough in-conference competition to close out the season. Good luck to the #Buckeyes as they face off against @MSU_Football today! #GoBucks #WintheMoment

Serious bipartisan legislating doesn’t always receive the same amount of attention as the partisan fights in #Congress & it should. This year alone, 2 of my bipartisan bills to help end online sex trafficking (#SESTA) & combat the opioid crisis (#STOPAct) were signed into law.

As an avid outdoorsman visiting our #NationalParks is one of my favorite things to do. Our parks are in desperate need of long-delayed maintenance & my bipartisan Restore Our Parks Act will help address this long-ignored problem. https://t.co/j2kVtT3ujz

Recently I visited 2 communities in #Ohio that are benefitting from grant funding received through my bipartisan #CARA law & through the #CURES law which I helped to enact. I’m encouraged to see these two laws making a needed difference in #Ohio.  https://t.co/1g1z4NUuJk

The landmark opioid package that @POTUS signed into law last month is a huge victory for #Ohio and for our nation. Here is how these measures will benefit #Ohio: https://t.co/6NZCo8jtSf #STOPAct #CRIBAct
Happy Veterans Day to those who prepared to sacrifice everything they held dear for the sake of our people & values. As a nation, we owe them a debt of gratitude.

Earlier this year, I supported, & #Congress enacted, bipartisan legislation called the MISSIONS act to ensure that #veterans have access to efficient, timely & quality health care in their local communities https://t.co/U6A8C4RTgo
The @Saints may have copied our catchphrase but I think the @Bengals will have their number at home today! #WhoDey
On this day, I think about my father & grandfather, both of whom were Army infantry officers, and give my full thanks to them & all our Veterans.

This #VeteransDay I applaud the #Ohio businesses that received the HIRE Vets Medallion Awards for their commitment & support of our nation’s heroes. I hope other businesses will follow their admirable lead. https://t.co/37wEj5oseh

The October #jobsreport shows that 250,000 jobs were created in October alone! This is great news & shows that #taxreform is continuing to boost economic growth, #job creation, and wage growth across America.  https://t.co/rsLuE31sQU #jobs
In my op-ed for @ThePlainDealer, I discuss how international trade is good for America as long as it’s fair and that comes from balanced trade & a level playing field. https://t.co/kRKk7SPA09 #jobs
This is very exciting news for the Wilmington Air Park and great news for Ohio as Amazon continues to invest and grow their footprint here with this new air gateway cargo and sorting operation.

For too long, foreign countries have been able to ship deadly synthetic drugs like fentanyl thru our own US mail with relative ease. I’m proud to say this will no longer be the case thanks to @POTUS signing my bipartisan #STOPAct into law. https://t.co/WwSc9kRNOo
Protecting the #GreatLakes is one of my top priorities & I’m grateful that the America’s Water Infrastructure Act contains initiatives that will benefit #Ohio. https://t.co/6F4Qf7MjVD

Recently I toured the Medina County Career Center & learned about the programs they provide to prepare #Ohioans for in-demand #jobs by helping them get the skills & training they need to fill these positions. https://t.co/TBJioV8N2l

The #opioidepidemic has hit #Ohio hard & people are desperate for solutions. In my op-ed for the #Cincinnati @Enquirer I highlight how the legislation that @POTUS signed into law last month will combat this crisis. https://t.co/hxVO6ag7x6 #STOPAct #CARA2

Across #Ohio, I’ve seen a commitment to take back our communities from the grips of the #opioidcrisis. With my #STOPAct, #CRIBAct, #CARA2 & Improving Care Act recently signed by #POTUS, I’m doing my part to help combat this epidemic. https://t.co/hxVO6ag7x6

Columbus is a growing, thriving city, and while I’m disappointed in today’s #HQ2 decision, there is no doubt it was best choice. Great work by the leadership in #Columbus, along with JobsOhio & Columbus2020, in highlighting everything #Ohio has to offer.
My staff and I are following the reports coming out of Medina. If you’re in the area, please follow the instructions of first responders. Hopefully there can be a safe resolution for all involved.

It’s National Apprenticeship Week! I’m working to ensure that #Ohio workers get the training & skills needed to fill in-demand #jobs across the state & apprenticeships are a terrific way to prepare the next generation of workers. #NAW2018
I applaud @OhioAG DeWine, #OhioBCI & #PikeCounty law enforcement for their tireless efforts to solve this horrific case. #Ohio https://t.co/6HhifmZiUy

I thoroughly enjoyed having Andrew intern in my DC office. It’s evident from his work ethic that he truly cares for the #Ohioans who call & visit our office every day. Thank you for all of your hard work! https://t.co/740lKDxRwI
We’re looking for spring interns! If you’re interested in learning more about an internship in my office, feel free to read information about the program here. https://t.co/CO0XBEHvhZ

Great to be on @CNBC this morning to discuss auto tariffs, trade w/ #China & the midterm election results. We have a lot of important work ahead of us & it’s important that we work together in a bipartisan manner to get it done. https://t.co/5cx6eSLEYC

America has a strong tradition of welcoming international students. There are over 37,000  #IntlStudents currently in #Ohio who will go on to contribute to our economy. During International Education Week, I’d like to applaud their contributions to our state and country. #IEW2018

Wonderful to meet w/ students from @OhioState and other #Ohioans at today’s Buckeye Coffee. We had great conversations about #ohio growing economy and the ongoing initiatives to combat the #Opioid epidemic in #Ohio. https://t.co/7aPI3fhpxP

I’m pleased @POTUS has nominated Judge Matt McFarland to be the next federal judge in the southern district of #Ohio. His esteemed reputation is well deserved & I know he will make #Ohio proud. https://t.co/qHbOrsw9w9

Today the #Senate passed the Coast Guard Reauthorization Bill which includes my bipartisan initiative to protect the #GreatLakes against the spread of invasive species & ensure the #Ohio & #GreatLakes shipping industry is competitive. https://t.co/pGCo6ojZsf

Protecting the #GreatLakes is one of my biggest priorities. I worked with @SenStabenow on this Coast Guard bill to ensure we protect Lake Erie from the spread of invasive species & keep our shipping industry competitive. https://t.co/pGCo6ojZsf

Apprenticeships are vital in teaching workers the skills needed to fill in-demand jobs. In July, @POTUS signed my bipartisan Educating Tomorrow’s Workforce Act into law, which will help apprentices get a running start in their careers. #NAW2018 https://t.co/n3TtZuS0z3

I have supported #Ohio pensioners & their fight for their at risk pensions that they’ve rightfully earned. I will continue to do everything in my power to help & support their efforts. https://t.co/OauZsP4tZ8

Happy National Rural Health Day! The #opioidcrisis knows no zip code. It has hit rural #Ohio hard & I’m proud that several of my bipartisan bills (#STOPAct #CRIBAct #CARA2) were signed into law & will begin to help #Ohioans take back their health & lives. https://t.co/HIVGyFyCia

As co-chair of the Senate CTE Caucus I have led efforts in the #Senate to strengthen #CTE & apprenticeship programs to help #Ohioans & Americans fill today’s in-demand #jobs. Apprenticeships are an important aspect of skilled labor & I’m proud to celebrate #NAW2018.

Today at an @EnergyGOP cmte hearing, the @NatlParkService Director nominee voiced his support for my bipartisan Restore Our Parks Act & committed to help enact this important legislation to protect & preserve our #NationalParks. https://t.co/M2Z5HGpQ2l

The recent elections in #Russia controlled Eastern #Ukraine are a sham & a blatant attempt to legitimize Russia’s illegal invasion & occupation of #Ukraine. I stand with the administration in condemning this gross violation of international law. https://t.co/gtuFT9QkIj
This month is National Veterans & Military Families Month. I want to thank all of our servicemen and women for their sacrifice & dedication to keeping our nation safe. You make America proud.

At @Heritage yesterday, I was honored to join others in commemorating the 85th Anniversary of the Holodomor genocide in #Ukraine. We must never forget these atrocities & as Americans we stand w/ Ukraine. https://t.co/7UQif6S1yv

I have introduced the Second Chance Reauthorization Act with @SenatorLeahy in order to help break the cycle of incarceration through drug treatment programs & #job training programs to help former inmate live up to their God-given potential. https://t.co/0wjGpneJou

The Second Chance Act has already changed thousands of lives in #Ohio & across the US. I’m proud of the bipartisan efforts to renew & strengthen this law so we can help more ex-offenders become productive members of our society. https://t.co/0wjGpneJou
I’m honored to receive this recognition & will continue to keep our communities safe from dangerous drugs like fentanyl. https://t.co/mN3KJ6LhjN

As co-chair of the #Senate UK Trade Caucus, I joined Senator @ChrisCoons in sending a letter to @POTUS supporting a bilateral trade agreement w/ the UK after its departure from the EU next year. https://t.co/s5Dtvdeiij

I joined several of my colleagues in sending a letter to HHS urging them to make Head Start programs available for the families of disabled veterans so we can help more children succeed in school & in life. https://t.co/q5GfeTdVlh

As the House and Senate work to pass criminal justice reform, we should reauthorize the Second Chance Act as part of that process so we can help more ex-offenders reenter society, rebuild their lives & live up to their God-given potential. https://t.co/0wjGpneJou
Congratulations to Gary Bronson from Laurel Oaks #Ohio for your win & thank you for your dedication in teaching your students the skills they need to fill in-demand #jobs! https://t.co/x8QfVi9Iut
Congrats to Brad DeMent of Delaware, #Ohio for your second place win! I can tell by the smiles on your students faces that this is well deserved! https://t.co/LYskeFN7RR

Congrats to my good friend @SenOrrinHatch on receiving the Presidential Medal of Freedom earlier today. He epitomizes what it means to be a public servant, a servant leader in every respect & I wish him nothing but the best in his future endeavors.

As co-chair of the Senate Great Lakes Task Force, protecting the #GreatLakes is a top priority. In the #Senate-passed Coast Guard Reauthorization Bill I worked to protect #LakeErie from invasive species & keep our shipping industry competitive! https://t.co/MTvgOAGYhe
Good luck to the Ohio State #Buckeyes as they take on the Maryland Terrapins today in the second to last regular season game! #GoBucks

The undemocratic, illegal, & sham elections that took place in Eastern #Ukraine is an attempt to legitimize Russia’s illegal invasion & occupation of #Ukrainian territory. I stand with Ukraine! https://t.co/DYEUHj9m3M

We still have a lot of work to do on opioids, but I’m proud that several of my initiatives - #STOPAct, #CARA2, #CRIBAct & Improving Care Act- have recently been signed into law by @POTUS. Read more in my op-ed for the Cincinnati @Enquirer! https://t.co/HgWe8Z2r5q

Apprenticeships are important for ensuring that Ohio workers learn the skills they need to fill in-demand jobs. As co-chair of the Senate CTE Caucus, I have led efforts to strengthen apprenticeship programs for Ohioans and all Americans and I’m happy to celebrate #NAW2018!
